coreAtributes.name: ragged chest wrap
coreAtributes.description: A thick strip of ragged, tattered cloth, that's been shaped in such a way so as to be wrapped around the chest in order to support a pair of breasts. A single loop has been incorporated into the crude design, which is meant to be slung over one shoulder.

displacementText.playerSelf: You take off your chest wrap.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab hold of [npc.name]'s chest wrap and roughly pull it off.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of your chest wrap and roughly pulls it off.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name]'s chest wrap and roughly pulls it off.

replacementText.playerSelf: You pull on the chest wrap.
replacementText.playerNPC: You get [npc.name] to wear the chest wrap.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You hold [npc.name] still as you roughly force [npc.herHim] to wear the chest wrap.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] gets you to wear the chest wrap.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] holds you still as [npc.she] roughly forces you to wear the chest wrap.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] gets [npc2.name] to wear the chest wrap.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] holds [npc2.name] still as [npc1.she] roughly forces [npc2.herHim] to wear the chest wrap.
